title: Really low Fps after the latest patch
body: Anyone else have the problem? esp with treash, sona and nami in game.

replies.body: Ok... looks like %%%% fps came back. Lol replayed uninstalled still no improvement
I have uninstalled LOL REplay completely. So far things have improved. Try that and report back?

Ive literally stopped playing this patch because im getting issues with this for the first time ever

This patch ive started getting drops only in teamfights. Cant stand it.

And no, i dont have a %%%% computer people because i can run this game at very high all settings if i feel like it.

Every other patch its been 60 fps all the time. But nope, thanks to the games still bad optimization even with the new map its horror to my eyes.
